about.title: About Saral Naturals
about.missionText: To empower communities with access to nutritious, safe, and delicious food products while fostering economic growth through sustainable practices.
about.visionText: To become the largest and most trusted supplier of high-quality dairy products and innovative vegetarian alternatives across both urban and rural regions of India.
about.valuesText: Quality, Consistency, Community Impact, Innovation, and Sustainability drive everything we do.
products.title: Our Products
products.dairyDesc: Fresh milk, yogurt (dahi), paneer, flavored milk, and flavored yogurt with guaranteed freshness and quality.
products.alternativesDesc: Delicious soya chaap and other plant-based alternatives that provide wholesome nutrition without compromise.
products.futureDesc: Specialized dairy products including khoa, butter, ghee, cream, and ice cream for broader market reach.

features.title: Why Choose Saral Naturals
features.qualityDesc: Every product meets the highest standards of purity, taste, and freshness.
features.freshnessDesc: From farm to table, we ensure maximum freshness with our efficient supply chain.
features.reachDesc: Serving both urban convenience seekers and rural communities with equal dedication.
features.innovationDesc: Constantly developing new products and improving existing ones based on market needs.
features.sustainabilityDesc: Eco-friendly practices that protect the environment while delivering quality products.
features.communityDesc: Creating positive impact in local communities through employment and economic growth.

investment.hero.title: Saral Naturals
investment.hero.subtitle: An Exclusive Opportunity to Invest in the Future of Dairy
investment.business.title: The Business: Our Commitment to Quality
investment.business.subtitle: This section provides an overview of Saral Naturals' business strategy, from our current premium products to our plans for future growth. We are building a diverse and robust portfolio to meet evolving consumer demands and capture a significant market share.
investment.business.dairy.title: Premium Dairy Portfolio
investment.business.dairy.desc: Fresh Milk, Dahi (Yogurt), Paneer (Indian Cheese), Flavored Milk, and Flavored Dahi.
investment.business.alternatives.title: Innovative Alternatives
investment.business.alternatives.desc: Delicious Soya Chaap, catering to diverse dietary preferences and expanding our customer base.
investment.business.future.title: Future Expansion
investment.business.future.desc: Targeting specialized products like Khoa, Butter, Ghee, Cream, and Ice Cream to drive future growth.
investment.calculator.title: Interactive Profit Projections
investment.calculator.subtitle: Explore how your investment translates into potential returns. Select an investment amount below to see your profit share and the projected monthly profits based on different company revenue scenarios. These figures are illustrative estimates to help you understand the potential.
investment.terms.title: The Fine Print: Key Terms & Conditions
investment.terms.subtitle: Transparency is key to our partnership. This section contains the detailed terms and conditions of the investment. Please click on each heading to expand and review the clauses carefully to ensure you have a complete understanding of the agreement.
investment.terms.disclaimers.title: Disclaimers on Financial Outcomes & Liability
investment.terms.disclaimers.content: Participation in Saral Naturals' capital structure inherently comprises exposure to commercial vicissitudes. The Company disavows any express or implied covenant or representation regarding the assured realization of pecuniary emoluments or any predetermined quantum of distributable profits. The prognostications anent monthly fiscal yields constitute mere hypotheticals, devoid of legal enforceability or prescriptive obligation. The Company shall remain entirely indemnified and held harmless from and against any and all liabilities, whether actual, contingent, or prospective, stemming from any decrement in capital or fiscal detriment incurred by the Investor. Investors unequivocally affirm their comprehension and assent to the proposition that their equity contribution is inextricably linked to the operational performance of the enterprise, prevailing macroeconomic conditions, and intrinsic hazards of the market. Consequently, the onus of pecuniary risk unequivocally reposes with the Investor.
investment.terms.refund.title: Refund and Return Policy
investment.terms.refund.content: Any refund or return related to your investment will be entertained only after 3 months from the date of investment. Requests before this period will not be considered. To initiate a refund request, the Investor must submit a formal written application via the Company's designated official channels. All requests will undergo review by the Company on a case-by-case basis. The decision to approve or deny any refund remains at the Company's sole and absolute discretion. If a refund is approved, the processing timeframe will be communicated to the Investor, and the refund will typically be processed via the original payment method or bank transfer. The Company reserves the right to deduct any applicable administrative fees or charges from the refund amount. The Company's determination regarding any refund or return shall be final and binding.
investment.terms.warranties.title: Investor Representations and Warranties
investment.terms.warranties.content: By making an investment, the Investor hereby represents and warrants that: They possess the requisite legal capacity and authority to enter into this agreement. The funds invested are derived from legitimate sources and do not originate from any illicit activities. They are investing solely based on their own independent assessment and understanding of the risks, without reliance on any representations or warranties from the Company not explicitly set forth herein. They comprehend the speculative nature of this investment and are capable of bearing the entire loss of their investment.
investment.terms.company.title: Company's Rights and Obligations
investment.terms.company.content: The Company shall: Utilize the invested capital judiciously for the establishment, operation, and expansion of Saral Naturals' business activities. Maintain accurate financial records of the business operations. Provide periodic updates or financial summaries to Investors, as deemed appropriate by the Company, for transparency. Not be obligated to provide any specific level of detail in reporting beyond what is legally required or deemed commercially reasonable by the Company.
investment.terms.confidentiality.title: Confidentiality
investment.terms.confidentiality.content: The Investor agrees to maintain the strict confidentiality of all non-public information concerning the Company's business, finances, strategies, and operations that may be disclosed to them in connection with this investment. This obligation of confidentiality shall survive the termination of this agreement.
investment.terms.termination.title: Termination of Investment
investment.terms.termination.content: This investment arrangement may be terminated by mutual written agreement between the Company and the Investor. The Company also reserves the right to terminate an Investor's participation under circumstances including, but not limited to, breach of these terms by the Investor, or if required by law or regulatory bodies. In the event of termination, the terms regarding profit distribution and refund policy shall apply.
investment.terms.governing.title: Governing Law and Jurisdiction
investment.terms.governing.content: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. Any disputes arising shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Surat, Gujarat, India.
investment.terms.general.title: General Disclaimer
investment.terms.general.content: This document serves informational purposes only and does not constitute legal or financial advice. Investors are strongly advised to seek independent professional legal and financial counsel before making any investment decisions.
investment.footer.tagline: Cultivating a Future of Quality, Growth, and Shared Prosperity Together.
